name: Angry bird
description: It's a bird with no wings, of course it's angry.

name: Babbling Book
description: A sentient book that babbles incessantly and can bore adventurers to death.

name: Badger
description: Badger Badger Badger Badger Badger Badger Badger Badger ...

name: Bat
description: Hopefully not a vampire.

name: Boar
description: Are you bored?

name: Bone Gnawer
description: A skeletal creature with an insatiable appetite for bones.

name: Crying Child
description: What is this, an airplane?

name: Daddy Long legs
description: More annoying than dangerous.

name: Fat Rat
description: Ratatouille, is that you?

name: Fire Snake
description: It will bite and it will burn.

name: Giant Centipede
description: Or is it a millipede?

name: Giant Frog
description: Lick it before it licks you.

name: Giggling Imp
description: A mischievous imp that finds everything amusing, even in battle.

name: Goblin Peasant
description: Carries a pitchfork and a grumpy attitude.

name: Land Fish
description: It's walking towards you.

name: Monodrone
description: We are Modron.

name: Myconid Sprout
description: It's a baby mushroom.

name: Pixie
description: A tiny fairy with colorful wings. It's a real distraction.

name: Rusty Automaton
description: A clunky, old mechanical construct that may malfunction at any moment.

name: Scorpion
description: Drowning frogs since 1933

name: Slapstick Imp
description: Pranks and chaos are its specialties.

name: Snarky Gnome
description: Prepare for sarcastic remarks.

name: Stealing Monkey
description: Hey, give that back!

name: Tunneling Corgi
description: An adorable dog with a penchant for digging... and a taste for blood? Bad dog!

name: Wolf
description: Definitely an alpha, look at those teeth.

name: Zombie Pigeon
description: Undead birds... they're everywhere.

name: Acidic Ooze
description: A slimy creature that loves corrosive hugs.

name: Air Elemental
description: This is your Marilyn Monroe moment

name: Angry Squirrel
description: Don't underestimate its acorn barrage.

name: Bearlin Raver
description: A poor furry beast, his mind burned out on poppers

name: Black Knight
description: Tis but a scratch!

name: Blink dog
description: A dog that teleports

name: Bumbling Minotaur
description: Charges with determination but frequently trips.

name: Cursed Painting
description: Its subjects don't appreciate your critiques.

name: Duodrone
description: "We are the ultimate law. All other law is tainted when compared to us."

name: Electric Sprite
description: A sprite that crackles with electricity, capable of shocking opponents.

name: Enraged Chihuahua
description: Small, but filled with endless fury.

name: Fiery Salamander
description: A lizard-like creature engulfed in flames, resistant to fire.

name: Flail snail
description: A massive snail with flails attached to it's head.

name: Goblin Bard
description: His songs can be quite irritating.

name: Goblin Chef
description: Deadly with a spatula, worse with jokes.

name: Goblin Shaman
description: A goblin spellcaster... and we're using that word loosely.

name: Haunted Teddy Bear
description: Soft, cuddly... and possessed by vengeful spirits.

name: Howling Banshee
description: A ghostly apparition that emits eerie wails to unsettle its foes.

name: Mischievous Sprite
description: Dancing, pranking, and causing mischief.

name: Myconid
description: Mushroom people. Walks like people, taste like mushroom.

name: Ogre
description: A hulking and aggressive creature with a taste for violence.

name: Plasmoid Explorer
description: A wobbly and gelatinous blob with a personality as fluid as its form.

name: Prankster Pixie
description: Tiny, giggling, and master of trickery.

name: Shadowy Stalker
description: A stealthy creature that disappears into the darkness, striking from behind.

name: Skeleton Warrior
description: An animated skeleton wielding a rusty sword and shield.

name: Sneaky Halfling Rogue
description: A nimble and sly halfling skilled in stealth and backstabbing.

name: Stone Golem
description: Rock hard.

name: Troll
description: Hmm, bugs.

name: Viper
description: A snake with potent venom that strikes with deadly accuracy.

name: Anti-vax Cultist
description: A follower of dark rituals who spreads diseases and curses.

name: Arcane Trickster
description: A rogue with magical prowess, adept at illusions and sneak attacks.

name: Basilisk
description: It has a "stone-cold" sense of humor.

name: Cyclops
description: With a singular eye for detail, the Cyclops has a knack for seeing things from a unique perspective.

name: Dancing Swordfish
description: It dances through the air, sword first.

name: Dire wolf
description: Like a regular wolf, but dire.

name: Dryad
description: The trees are watching.

name: Enchanted Garden Gnome
description: Practitioner of gnome magic and terrible puns.

name: Gargantuan Pigeon
description: It's just a really, really big bird.

name: Gelatinous cube
description: Three dimensions is better than four.

name: Gelatinous Pizza
description: It slimes and tastes delicious.

name: Hill Giant
description: Hill-arious.

name: Icy Elemental
description: Did it just get colder in here?

name: Manticore
description: Body of a lion, wings of a bat, and a tail with venomous spikes.

name: Owlbear
description: Sounds like a hoot.

name: Plasmoid Warrior
description: A wobbly and gelatinous blob with a personality as fluid as its form.

name: Pyromaniac Pixie
description: Sets everything on fire for the fun of it.

name: Snarky Banshee
description: Your misfortune is her punchline.

name: Sovreign Myconid
description: Mushroom people. Walks like people, taste like mushroom.

name: Thunderous Minotaur
description: A minotaur warrior whose powerful hooves create shockwaves.

name: Tridrone
description: "We are structure. All other structure crumbles when brought against us."

name: Zombie Accountant
description: Constantly crunching numbers... and brains.

name: Bardic Gargoyle
description: Turns battlefields into singing competitions.

name: Bone Devil
description: Beware, getting in a battle of wits with a Bone Devil might leave you "bonely" defeated.

name: Chaotic Chameleon
description: Changes colors, emotions, and alliances.

name: Disco Orc
description: Fights with sick dance moves and a killer groove.

name: Earth Elemental
description: Seems pretty solid

name: Epic Bardic Battle Band
description: Instruments of war and melodies of mayhem.

name: Fire Elemental
description: A hot mess

name: Floating Eyeball
description: It's watching... and judging.

name: Fluffy, the Killer Bunny
description: Aww, it's so cute... and deadly.

name: Gelatinous Cube
description: Anyone up for jello shots?

name: Goblin Artificer
description: Invents strange gadgets that may or may not explode.

name: Goblin Firework Engineer
description: Handle with extreme caution... or run.

name: Goblin Illusionist
description: Tricks your mind while emptying your pockets.

name: Goblin Mechanic
description: Engineers deadly contraptions with questionable safety.

name: Inflatable Mimic
description: You'll never trust another balloon.

name: Librarian
description: They never forget, and they never forgive

name: Marauding Monkey Gang
description: They're cheeky and they know it.

name: Misguided Bardbarian
description: Part bard, part barbarian, all confused.

name: Pirate duck
description: Quack!

name: Plasmoid Boss
description: A wobbly and gelatinous blob with a personality as fluid as its form.

name: Poltergeist Chef
description: Throws utensils and serves ghostly food.

name: Quadrone
description: "We are order. All other order disappears when held to our light."

name: Raging Barbarian
description: A fierce warrior consumed by battle rage, capable of dealing devastating blows.

name: Sneaky Kobold Artificer
description: Small but brimming with traps and inventions.

name: Stone Giant
description: Their impressive bouldering skills and a penchant for sculpting masterpieces out of stone make them a "rock"-star in their own right.

name: Supreme Cube
description: A geometrically grandiose being that exudes an aura of mathematical mystery.

name: Swarm of Fiendish Imps
description: A horde of tiny, mischievous imps that overwhelm their opponents.

name: Tooth Fairy Bandit
description: Steals more than just teeth.

name: Vampire Postal Worker
description: Your mail will never be the same again.

name: Witch
description: "I'll get you, my pretty, and your little dog, too!"

name: Black Dragon Wyrmling
description: A small and crafty dragonling, honing its dark abilities while testing its "bite-sized" acid breath.

name: Blue Dragon Wyrmling
description: A tiny, newly hatched dragon with shimmering blue scales, it may be small, but it's already showing a big attitude.

name: Djinn
description: Grants wishes, or just straight up kills you. Stick around and find out?

name: Explosive Gnome Alchemist
description: Handles explosives... with mixed results.

name: Grumpy Treant
description: Has a bad case of tree-mper tantrums.

name: Hag
description: "I'm not super comfortable in my skin."

name: Hydra
description: Each head has its own sassy personality.

name: Kung Fu Kangaroo
description: Delivers punches and kicks with expert precision.

name: Master of Puns
description: Wields words with deadly accuracy... of humor.

name: Pentadrone
description: "We are perfect law."

name: Pun Golem
description: It wields terrible jokes as weapons.

name: Sassy Sphinx
description: Prepare for riddles and sass in equal measure.

name: Storm Giant
description: Majestic, with a stormy personality, they toss lightning bolts like confetti and create weather with a flair for the dramatic.

name: Unicorn
description: Blblbl bl blbl blbl.

name: Cursed Jester
description: Laughs, pranks, and curses... all at once.

name: Drunken Master Monk
description: Intoxicated, but more dangerous than ever.

name: Epic Rap Battle Bard
description: Rhymes sharp enough to cut through armor.

name: Goblin Technomancer
description: Hacks reality with gadgets and witty comebacks.

name: Phoenix
description: You can't spell Rebirth without Fiery Death

name: Raging Barbarian Sheep
description: Its fury is as wooly as its coat.

name: Red Dragon Wyrmling
description: A young dragon with fiery instincts and a desire to grow strong—it's still learning to control its "temper."

name: Sewer Kraken
description: Rises from the depths with a stinky vengeance.

name: The Singing Siren
description: Her voice enchants... and annoys.

name: Vampire Telemarketer
description: Calls you even after the sun sets.

name: Young Black Dragon
description: A glossy black-scaled hunter, perfecting stealth and ambush tactics with the grace of a shadowy dance.

name: Young Blue Dragon
description: A juvenile with electric-blue scales, eager to prove its strength and show off its "shocking" personality.

name: Young Red Dragon
description: Fiery and fierce, this "teenage" dragon has some serious scales to settle with adventurers who dare cross its path.

name: Beholder
description: Let me take a look at you.

name: Black Dragon
description: Sinister and cunning, stalking from shadows with corrosive acid breath—talk about having a "colorful" personality.

name: Blue Dragon
description: Majestic and lightning-fast, this dazzling dragon will strike you with awe—and perhaps a well-timed lightning bolt.

name: Dimension-Hopping Mimic
description: It's a mimic, and it's everywhere.

name: Goblin Warlock
description: Deals in dark magic and dark humor.

name: Medusa
description: Turns adventurers to stone....

name: Mind Flayer
description: A mastermind of psychic manipulation and domination.

name: Narcissistic Succubus
description: Beauty, charm, and an obsession with selfies.

name: Voidwalker
description: A celestial being with the ability to traverse the void between stars and wield dark energies from the cosmos.

name: Ancient Black Dragon
description: Colossal and malevolent, it's been around so long it's probably mastered "ancient" dad jokes.

name: Ancient Blue Dragon
description: Legendary and imposing, this old-timer loves sharing tales of ancient storms, even if they're a bit "windy."

name: Animated Garden Gnome Army
description: They march, they fight, and they're hilarious.

name: Celestial Dice
description: Determines your fate

name: Demon
description: CHAMEK ATH UTHUL ARAK!

name: Illusory Sphinx
description: Riddles within riddles, with a side of illusions.

name: Infinite Gnome Loop
description: Short, chaotic, and replicating.

name: Lich
description: Laughs through eternity and beyond.

name: Mischievous Archfey
description: Toying with mortals just for laughs.

name: Pit Fiend
description: Not your pit friend. Definitely not.

name: Purple Worm
description: It's purple, slimy, and very hungry.

name: Red Dragon
description: Hot-headed and not good at sharing.

name: Time-Warping Sorcerer
description: Messing with time and making it groovy.

name: Ancient Red Dragon
description: Old, wise, and still very, very angry.

name: Archmage
description: A master of arcane arts with unlimited power.

name: Astral Leviathan
description: An immense and ancient creature dwelling in the celestial depths, whose movements are said to cause celestial phenomena.

name: Avatar of Destruction
description: Unleashes cataclysmic forces upon the world.

name: Cosmic Prankster
description: Plays jokes across the stars, even on deities.

name: Dracolich
description: A skeletal dragon with a bone to pick.

name: Elemental Lord
description: Commands the raw power of the elemental planes.

name: Grim Reaper
description: Harbinger of death and collector of souls.

name: Mind Flayer Overlord
description: A mastermind of psychic manipulation and domination.

name: Primordial Titan
description: An ancient and colossal force of primal power.

name: Soul Devourer
description: Consumes the very essence of life and souls.

name: Tarrasque
description: What do you mean it's not Godzilla?

name: Time Manipulator
description: Controls the flow of time to their advantage.

name: Astral Dreadnought
description: Prepare for cosmic trouble, and make it double.

name: Celestial Arbiter
description: Enforces divine justice with unparalleled might.

name: Dimensional Worm
description: Jumps between dimensions and loves puzzles.

name: Ether Drake
description: A dragon that soars through the fabric of reality.

name: Shard
description: A crystalline entity that shatters expectations.

name: The Great Impostor
description: Assumes the form of anything, including your friends.

name: The Unbound
description: A being who has broken free from the constraints of reality.

name: Void Behemoth
description: An embodiment of cosmic emptiness and chaos.

name: World Eater
description: Devours entire realms and civilizations.
